name: Wallace.dog Interactive Scene: Home
description:
More than an animation, yet not quite a game: 

this is an interactive scene for Wallace.dog! My reason for making this was to test what interactions felt good with my Wallace.dog character, and to familiarize myself with the game making process generally.

Controls
  • Movement = WASD   (or arrow keys)
  • Action = J   (or F, Z, or Shift)
  • Tricks = Space
  • Show Controls = C 
  • (use Action & Trick buttons w/ movement buttons)

If you play it, I'd love to hear your thoughts! In particular, I'd love to know if there's anything that sparked your curiosity or that you kept returning to. Feedback on controls (even if mean or critical) is also appreciated.
